name: Taco Wizard 3: The Legend of the Taco Wizard
name_original: Taco Wizard 3: The Legend of the Taco Wizard
description:
GameJam-game made for Ludum Dare 33. Theme: "You Are The Monster"

Something has happened to the world where you live. Try to figure out what to do, try to remember what you have done, try to find answers to your questions. Who is the Ultimate Gods, what happens if you rub the lamp and how do you reach the Taco Wizard?

Taco Wizard 3 is an epic adventure about friendship and betrayal.

Try it now!!

Play it on a browser → http://www.vulkanmannen.itch.io/tacowizard3

Made by:

Alexander Karlsson
Pablo Sorribes Bernhard
Gustav Håkansson
Carl Bergquist

Ludum Dare Entry: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=p...
